description: Allows an operator to verify the current status of a dispense area (room), including cleanliness and environmental statuses, view the log for the area, and optionally update or record cleaning as needed.
intent: Ensure that the dispense area meets required status values before continuing with dispense actions by verifying and updating room statuses or recording exceptions.
preconditions: A dispense area is identified and loaded for verification
postconditions: Dispense area statuses are validated against required values
Room status values are updated if the operator chose to update
side_effects: May open the Equipment Maintenance page to update room status
May open the Exception page to record an exception
example_usage: Operator reviews displayed instructions and current room statuses, selects the status checks to perform, and clicks Finish to complete area verification before proceeding with material dispense.
